game.name: Where Ferrets 雪貂在哪里
game.shortDescription: Search for 100 Ferrets. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.
